Entity

Class PlayerList

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity.PlayerList

  • public class PlayerList
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which has an array with players and can find a specific player or the next player.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayers

        public void addPlayers(java.lang.String[] playerNames,
                       int amountOfPlayers)
        Adds entered players to the players array attribute.
        Parameters:
        playerNames - String array of names that is entered, so it can be added to player array.
        amountOfPlayers - Number of players, so we know how long the player array is.

      • getAllPlayers

        public Player[] getAllPlayers()
        Method to find all players (as an Player object) in a Player[].
        Returns:
        players

      • getPlayerNames

        public java.lang.String[] getPlayerNames()
        Returns:
        all players' names as a String array.

      • killPlayer

        public void killPlayer(java.lang.String playerName)
        Method o kill a specific player if it is the player's own turn
        Parameters:
        playerName - To find the specific player

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()

      • searchPlayer

        public Player searchPlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Method to find player, if it isn't the player's turn.
        Parameters:
        name - A player name which is playing the game
        Returns:
        The player you were looking for, as long as the player is in the game or else it will return null.

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        Finds the index number of the next player
